tasks.label: Java: CodeSonar analyze
command: ./mvnw -B compile ; codesonar analyze petclinic -hubuser ${config:codesonar.hubUser} -auth certificate -name ${input:codesonarAnalysisName} -conf-file codesonar.conf -project OSS-Projects/PetClinic-GitHub/developers/${config:codesonar.hubUser}  ${config:codesonar.hubAddress} cs-java-scan  -include-sources src/main/**/*.java -include-artifacts target/**/*.class
